thread.title: Sovereign Citizens Stage Anti-Government Festival At Tax Payers Expense

author: Karoli
title: Sovereign Citizens Stage Anti-Government Festival At Tax Payers Expense
text:
sharethis 10/03/15 6:30am County commissioners in 10 of Utah's southern counties are giving tax dollars to put on the Western Freedom Festival - an anti-government political event promoted as a celebration of Western heritage. The celebratory illusion is enhanced by country music star Darryl Worley, who will perform. The festival is taking place on October 23rd on the campusâ€¦ Comments
